function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited use of outdoor spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor transmission of contagious diseases, lack of physical activity, and social isolation","Mitigation":"Promote and facilitate safe outdoor activities, encourage regular outdoor exercise, and create opportunities for social interaction in outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Smart park monitoring systems, mobile apps for outdoor activity tracking, and community engagement platforms","People":"General public, especially urban residents and children","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Changes in UGS visiting behavior during COVID-19","Impact":"Potential overcrowding, uneven distribution of visitors, and increased risk of disease transmission in popular outdoor areas","Mitigation":"Implement visitor management strategies, promote a wider distribution of visitors across different outdoor spaces, and monitor and enforce social distancing measures in UGS","Technologies":"Visitor tracking and analytics tools, geospatial analysis for visitor distribution, and smart signage for crowd management","People":"UGS visitors, local communities, and public health agencies","Owner":"Local governments, park management authorities, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Traveling to UGS at varying distances","Impact":"Unequal access to outdoor spaces, potential overuse of nearby UGS, and limited utilization of distant natural areas","Mitigation":"Improve access to diverse UGS, invest in neighborhood parks and green infrastructure, and encourage responsible use of both nearby and distant outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Geographic information systems (GIS) for UGS planning, mobile apps for UGS navigation, and smart urban planning for equitable UGS distribution","People":"Residents in different geographical areas, outdoor enthusiasts, and environmental advocates","Owner":"City governments, urban planners, and environmental conservation organizations"}]}
